resources.string: CTMDroid is an application that uses the services of www.muovetevi.it to show the schedules of public transport. Times are due to inaccuracies in the service offered by www.muovetevi.it or the fact that the time on your phone is not synchronized with the time of the public transport network. Click on the "?" to get help.

Quick Search 
The Quick Search allows you to view transit times within an hour from when you select the stop.
- Click on the magnifying glass to search for the desired stop. To find your bus stop you just need to type in the search bar the bus stop name o the bus stop number. I suggest to use the number, it's easiest and fastest, you can find it in the bus stop, it's written on a sticker with white font and blue background. Click on the desired stop to see transit times. 
- By clicking on the star bar displays the favorite stops (if any). 

Favorites.
- When you see the name of a stop click on the star next to the bus stop name to add to favorites.
- To delete a favorite stop, clear favorites in the page of the star next to the name of the stop.
